title: How to understand the (Indian) economy better - Quora

response.answer_text: -almost all business channels are free market supporters so naturally any move by the govt to increase subsidies is going to be criticized-they want RBI guvernor to keep interest rates low  but the guv doesn't oblige unless inflation is low (below 6%) -just keep track of quarterly gdp growth and inflation  nos-gdp above 8% and inflation below 6% is the best case scenario for india -since privatisation is perceived to be efficient , they are gonna press the govt ministers towards it just the basics though
